E1 1m1a1u1 1k1a1 1l1a1u1r1e1l1a1
1u1a1 1ʻ1i1k1e1 1m1ā1k1o1u1 1p1e1h1e1a1 1e1 1h1o1ʻ1o1k1ō1 1a1i1:1
1K1a1l1a1u1n1u1 1m1e1 1k1a1 1h1a1n1o1h1a1n1o1 1e1 1o1l1a1 1n1e1i1 1m1ā1k1o1u1
1A1 1e1 1h1o1ʻ1o1h1i1k1i1 1p1a1h1a1 1m1ā1k1o1u1 1e1 1m1a1k1e1 1m1e1 1k1a1 1h1a1n1o1h1a1n1o1.1 1E1 1n1ā1 1k1ā1n1a1k1a1 1m1a1k1e1!1 1k1a1 1u1ē1 1k1a1p1u1:1
1K1ū1ʻ1o1k1o1ʻ1a1,1 1k1ū1ʻ1o1k1o1ʻ1a1,1 1k1ū1ʻ1o1k1o1ʻ1a1!1
1L1o1h1e1 1i1 1k1e1 1k1a1n1i1 1o1 1n1ā1 1k1a1u1l1a1h1a1o1 1h1a1k1i1:1
1E1 1ʻ1i1k1e1 1i1 1k1a1 1K1a1u1l1i1k1e1 1h1a1n1o1h1a1n1o1 1m1a1 1k1a1 1n1o1h1o1 1a1l1i1ʻ1i1.1 1K1ū1 1i1 1k1a1 1m1a1k1a1 1o1 1k1a1 1h1o1n1u1a1

1I1 1k1o1 1l1ā1k1o1u1 1h1e1l1e1 1ʻ1a1n1a1 1h1a1ʻ1a1l1u1l1u1 1n1ā1 1m1e1a1 1ā1p1a1u1.1 1N1e1ʻ1e1 1ʻ1i1a1 1n1ā1 1h1a1l1e1 1k1u1p1a1p1a1ʻ1u1 1o1 1k1a1 1I1n1c1a1

1ʻ1O1 1k1a1 1m1e1a1 1ā1u1 1e1 1ʻ1i1k1e1 1n1e1i1 1e1 1h1o1ʻ1o1h1o1u1 1n1e1i1 1i1 1k1ā1u1 1p1o1ʻ1e1 1k1e1i1k1i1

1ʻ1A1ʻ1o1l1e1 1ʻ1o1e1 1ʻ1i1k1e1 1i1ā1 1l1ā1k1o1u1 1e1 1ʻ1a1i1 1a1n1a1 1e1 1l1i1k1e1 1m1e1 1n1ā1 1h1o1l1o1h1o1l1o1n1a1 1h1i1h1i1u1
